name: Invade, Rewind, Restart
description:
A solo-nerd game for the Home of the Nerds 1st Ever Game Jam. A take on Space Invaders. Since the theme is Dying is good, the aim is to die to get resources to upgrade your ships, then beat the enemy AI defending against your invaders!

Made using the Unity API: https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/

Submitted by "UrFaveGinger (James O)"

Solo Nerd

Dev Log:

-Fiexed starting money problem

-Fixed Invaders breach shields win event
